[[1990â91 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1990â91]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] team in 1989â90 season. The team fought for promotion to first division in second league but finished 3rd in its group. AydÄ±n Tohumcu was the manager at the start of the season (10.08.1989). On 04.01.1990 The [[Netherlands national football team]]'s former trainer Gerhart Block became MÄ°Y manager. ==Pre-season== * 13.08.1989 - MÄ°Y-Adana Demirspor: 1-1. ==1989â90 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group C in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1989â90 Turkish Second Football League|1989â90]] season. League played in three groups with 17 teams in each. Bottom three teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top team promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season.[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8990/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 26 August 2009. MÄ°Y finished 3rd with 16 wins and 43 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group C in [[1989â90 Turkish Second Football League|1989â90]] season is shown in the following table.Standings and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8990/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
